lore: Infected with the Chortling Murrain, these desperately grinning daemons caper and quip as they play discordant dirges on their foul gutpipes. Their antics either amuse or irritate their fellow daemons so much that they hasten into the press of battle, while mortals infected with the murrain may literally laugh themselves to death.

otherAbilities.Jolly Gutpipes:: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.
otherAbilities.Disease of Mirth (Aura):: At the start of the Fight phase , every enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test .
